scrollDown.description: Alt text for button to take user down to bottom of conversation, shown when user scrolls up

importChooserTitle.message: 选择包含导出数据的文件夹
importChooserTitle.description: Title of the popup window used to select data previously exported

timerOption_10_seconds.description: Label for a selectable option in the message expiration timer menu

view.description: Used as a label on a button allowing user to see more information

linkedDevices.description: Used in the guidance to help people find the 'link new device' area of their Signal mobile app

yesterday.description: Section header in the media gallery

replyingToYourself.description: Shown in iOS theme when you quote yourself

documents.description: Header of the secondary pane in the media gallery, showing every non-media attachment

upgradingDatabase.message: 更新数据库。这可能需要一点时间...
upgradingDatabase.description: Message shown on the loading screen when we're changing database structure on first run of a new version

lastSynced.description: Label for date and time of last sync operation

attemptingReconnection.message: 在 $reconnect_duration_in_seconds$ 秒后尝试重新连接

thisMonth.description: Section header in the media gallery

unsupportedAttachment.message: 不支持的附件类型，点击保存。

androidMessageLengthWarning.message: Android客户端仅能接收此消息的前2000个字符
androidMessageLengthWarning.description: Warning that long messages could not get received completely by Android clients.

leftTheGroup.description: Shown in the conversation history when a single person leaves the group

youChangedTheTimer.description: Message displayed when you change the message expiration timer in a conversation.

settings.description: Menu item and header for global settings

timerOption_5_seconds_abbreviated.description: Very short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation header

importCompleteHeader.description: Header shown on the screen at the end of a successful import process

timestamp_m.description: Brief timestamp for messages sent about one minute ago. Displayed in the conversation list and message bubble.

deviceName.description: The label in settings panel shown for the user-provided name for this desktop instance

debugLog.description: View menu item to open the debug log (title case)

gotIt.description: Label for a button that dismisses a dialog. The user clicks it to confirm that they understand the message in the dialog.

disappearingMessages.description: Conversation menu option to enable disappearing messages

deleteWarning.message: 您确定吗？点击“删除”会从此设备上永久删除这条消息。

showMore.description: Displays the details of a key change

verifyHelp.message: 如果您想要确认与$name$端对端加密是否安全，请将以上数字和对方设备的数字进行比对。

membersNeedingVerification.message: 自上次验证以来，您与多位群组成员的安全码已发生改变。点击一个群组成员可查看您与他们的新安全码。
membersNeedingVerification.description: When there are multiple previously-verified group members with safety number changes, a banner will be shown. The list of contacts with safety number changes is shown, and this text introduces that list.

timerOption_5_minutes_abbreviated.description: Very short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation header

quit.description: Command in the tray icon menu, to quit the application

messagesBelow.description: Alt text for button to take user down to bottom of conversation with more than one message out of screen

resetSession.description: This is a menu item for resetting the session, using the imperative case, as in a command.

replyingToYou.description: Shown in iOS theme when someone else quotes a message from you

offline.description: Displayed when the desktop client has no network connection.

hideMenuBar.description: Label text for menu bar visibility setting

checkNetworkConnection.description: Obvious instructions for when a user's computer loses its network connection

notificationSettingsDialog.description: Explain the purpose of the notification settings

timestamp_h.description: Brief timestamp for messages sent about one hour ago. Displayed in the conversation list and message bubble.

timerOption_0_seconds_abbreviated.description: Short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation list snippet

clearDataButton.description: Button in the settings dialog starting process to delete all data

syncExplanation.message: 从您的移动设备导入所有Signal的群组和联系人。

youLeftTheGroup.description: Displayed when a user can't send a message because they have left the group

deleteMessages.description: Menu item for deleting messages, title case.

selectAContact.message: 选择一个联系人或群组来开始聊天。

aboutSignalDesktop.description: Item under the Help menu, which opens a small about window

selectedLocation.description: Message shown as the export location if we didn't capture the target directory

verifyContact.message: 您可能希望$tag_start$ 验证 $tag_end$您与此联系人的安全代码。
verifyContact.description: Use $tag_start$ and $tag_end$ to wrap the word or phrase in this sentence that the user should click on in order to navigate to the verification screen. These placeholders will be replaced with appropriate HTML code.

changedRecently.message: 您与$name$的安全码最近被修改过。这可能意味着有人正在尝试拦截您的通讯，或者$name$只是简单的重装了下Signal。
changedRecently.description: Shown on confirmation dialog when user attempts to send a message

sent.description: Label for the time a message was sent

thisWeek.description: Section header in the media gallery

importingHeader.message: 正在加载联系人和消息
importingHeader.description: Header of screen shown as data is import

theyChangedTheTimer.description: Message displayed when someone else changes the message expiration timer in a conversation.

timestamp_s.description: Brief timestamp for messages sent less than a minute ago. Displayed in the conversation list and message bubble.

mainMenuSettings.description: The label that is used for the Preferences menu in the program main menu. This should be consistent with the standard naming for ‘Preferences’ on the operating system.

changedRecentlyMultiple.message: 您与多位群组成员的安全码已发生改变。这可能表示有人试图偷听您的对话，或者只是联系人他们重新安装了 Signal。
changedRecentlyMultiple.description: Shown on confirmation dialog when user attempts to send a message

timerOption_1_day.description: Label for a selectable option in the message expiration timer menu

reportIssue.description: Link to open the issue tracker

newMessage.description: Displayed in notifications for only 1 message

nameOnly.description: Label for setting notifications to display sender name only

from.description: Label for the sender of a message

deleteConversationConfirmation.description: Confirmation dialog text that asks the user if they really wish to delete the conversation. Answer buttons use the strings 'ok' and 'cancel'. The deletion is permanent, i.e. it cannot be undone.

mainMenuWindow.description: The label that is used for the Window menu in the program main menu. The '&' indicates that the following letter will be used as the keyboard 'shortcut letter' for accessing the menu with the Alt-<letter> combination.

importCompleteLinkButton.message: 将这个设备关联到您的手机
importCompleteLinkButton.description: Button shown at end of successful 'light' import process, so the standard linking process still needs to happen

unlinkedWarning.message: 重新链接桌面版Signal到您的移动设备来继续。

today.description: Section header in the media gallery

debugLogExplanation.message: 该日志将公开发布以供参考，您可以在提交之前检查和编辑。

linkYourPhone.message: 关联您的手机到 Signal 桌面版
linkYourPhone.description: Shown on the front page when the application first starst, above the QR code

newPhoneNumber.message: 键入电话号码来添加联系人
newPhoneNumber.description: Placeholder for adding a new number to a contact

viewAllMedia.description: This is a menu item for viewing all media (images + video) in a conversation, using the imperative case, as in a command.

noLongerVerified.message: 您与 $name$ 的安全号码已发生改变，而且不再被确认。点击展示。
noLongerVerified.description: Shown in converation banner when user's safety number has changed, but they were previously verified.

video.description: Shown in a quotation of a message containing a video if no text was originally provided with that video

searchForPeopleOrGroups.description: Placeholder text in the search input

someRecipientsFailed.description: When you send to multiple recipients via a group, and the message went to some recipients but not others.

noNameOrMessage.message: 发件人和信息均不提醒
noNameOrMessage.description: Label for setting notifications to display no name and no message text

syncNow.description: Label for a button that syncs contacts and groups from your phone

syncFailed.message: 导入失败，确保您的电脑和手机已连网。
syncFailed.description: Informational text displayed if a sync operation times out.

learnMore.message: 了解更多有关安全代码的信息
learnMore.description: Text that links to a support article on verifying safety numbers

timerSetOnSync.description: Message displayed when timer is set on initial link of desktop device.

messageCaption.description: Prefix of attachment alt tags in the media gallery

deleteAllDataButton.description: Text of the button that deletes all data

unreadMessages.description: Text for unread message separator, with count

installTooManyDevices.message: 很抱歉，您已连接过多的设备，请删除一些然后重试。

joinedTheGroup.description: Shown in the conversation history when a single person joins the group

goToForums.description: Item under the Help menu, takes you to the forums

menuSetupWithImport.message: 使用导入的数据进行配置
menuSetupWithImport.description: When the application is not yet set up, menu option to start up the import sequence

timerOption_30_minutes_abbreviated.description: Very short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation header

themeAndroidDark.description: Label text for dark Android theme

timerOption_1_minute_abbreviated.description: Very short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation header

loadingMessages.description: Message shown on the loading screen when we're catching up on the backlog of messages

speech.description: Item under the Edit menu, with 'start/stop speaking' items below it

importErrorHeader.description: Header of the error screen after a failed import

changedSinceVerified.message: 您与$name$的安全码自从上次确认后被修改过。这可能意味着有人正在尝试拦截您的通讯，或者$name$只是简单的重装了下Signal。
changedSinceVerified.description: Shown on confirmation dialog when user attempts to send a message

importAgain.description: Button shown if the user runs into an error during import, allowing them to start over

upgrade.description: Label text for button to upgrade the app to the latest version

showLess.description: Hides the details of a key change

newIdentity.description: Header for a key change dialog

installTagline.description: Tagline displayed under 'installWelcome' string on the install page

show.description: Command under Window menu, to show the window

isNotVerified.message: 您还没验证与 $name$ 的安全代码。
isNotVerified.description: Summary state shown at top of the safety number screen if user has not verified contact.

disconnected.description: Displayed when the desktop client cannot connect to the server.

syncing.description: Label for a disabled sync button while sync is in progress.

multipleNoLongerVerified.message: 您与此群组内多位成员的安全码已经改变，而且不再被确认。点击展示。
multipleNoLongerVerified.description: Shown in conversation banner when more than one group member's safety number has changed, but they were previously verified.

acceptNewKey.description: Label for a button to accept a new safety number

timerOption_12_hours_abbreviated.description: Very short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation header

signalSettings.description: Used in the guidance to help people find the 'link new device' area of their Signal mobile app

timestampFormat_M.description: Timestamp format string for displaying month and day (but not the year) of a date within the current year, ex: use 'MMM D' for 'Aug 8', or 'D MMM' for '8 Aug'.

plusButton.description: The button used in Signal Android to add a new linked device

chooseDirectory.description: Button to allow the user to find a folder on disk

mainMenuEdit.description: The label that is used for the Edit menu in the program main menu. The '&' indicates that the following letter will be used as the keyboard 'shortcut letter' for accessing the menu with the Alt-<letter> combination.

timerOption_6_hours_abbreviated.description: Very short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation header

unregisteredUser.description: Error message displayed when sending to an unregistered user.

timerOption_1_day_abbreviated.description: Very short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation header

replyingTo.description: Shown in iOS theme when you or someone quotes to a message which is not from you

sync.description: Label for contact and group sync settings

timerOption_1_week.description: Label for a selectable option in the message expiration timer menu

received.description: Label for the time a message was received

youMarkedAsNotVerified.message: 您已将与$name$的安全码标记为未验证。
youMarkedAsNotVerified.description: Shown in the conversation history when the user marks a contact as not verified, whether on the safety number screen or by dismissing a banner or dialog.

isVerified.description: Summary state shown at top of the safety number screen if user has verified contact.

timerOption_30_seconds.description: Label for a selectable option in the message expiration timer menu

deleteAllDataHeader.description: Header of the full-screen delete data confirmation screen

deleteAllDataProgress.description: Message shown to user when app is disconnected and data deleted

sendMessage.description: Placeholder text in the message entry field

menuReportIssue.description: Item under the Help menu, takes you to GitHub new issue form (title case)

loadDataDescription.message: 您已完成了导出步骤，被导出的联系人和消息在等着您给它们一个新家。请选择包含您 Signal 数据的文件夹。
loadDataDescription.description: Introduction to the process of importing messages and contacts from disk

me.description: The label for yourself when shown in a group member list

mediaMessage.description: Description of a message that has an attachment and no text, displayed in the conversation list as a preview.

unreadMessage.description: Text for unread message separator, just one message

expiredWarning.message: 此桌面版Signal已过期，请升级到最新版本以继续发送消息。
expiredWarning.description: Warning notification that this version of the app has expired

fileSizeWarning.message: 对不起，所选文件超过最大限制。

chooseDeviceName.description: The header shown on the 'choose device name' screen in the device linking process

autoUpdateNewVersionInstructions.message: 点击“重启 Signal”来应用更新。

timerOption_0_seconds.description: Label for option to turn off message expiration in the timer menu

importError.message:
请确认您选对了包含已保存 Signal 数据 的文件夹，其名字一般以“Signal Export”开头。您还可以在 Chrome App 上保存一份新的数据。

如果以上步骤对您没有帮助，请提交调试日志，以供我们帮助您完成迁移！
importError.description: Message shown if the import went wrong.

invalidNumberError.description: When a person inputs a number that is invalid

installWelcome.description: Welcome title on the install page

messageBelow.description: Alt text for button to take user down to bottom of conversation with a new message out of screen

menuSetupAsNewDevice.description: When the application is not yet set up, menu option to start up the set up as fresh device

installConnectionFailed.description: Displayed when we can't connect to the server.

messageNotSent.description: Informational label, appears on messages that failed to send

initialSync.message: 正在同步联系人和群组
initialSync.description: Shown during initial link while contacts and groups are being pulled from mobile device

mainMenuView.description: The label that is used for the View menu in the program main menu. The '&' indicates that the following letter will be used as the keyboard 'shortcut letter' for accessing the menu with the Alt-<letter> combination.

autoUpdateNewVersionMessage.message: 有新版的 Signal 可用。

replyToMessage.description: Shown in triple-dot menu next to message to allow user to start crafting a message with a quotation

photo.description: Shown in a quotation of a message containing a photo if no text was originally provided with that image

media.description: Header of the default pane in the media gallery, showing images and videos

noContents.description: Shown in a message bubble if we have nothing in the message to display, or a quote and nothing else

unblockToSend.message: 取消阻止此联系人来发送消息。
unblockToSend.description: Brief message shown when trying to message a blocked number

mainMenuHelp.description: The label that is used for the Help menu in the program main menu. The '&' indicates that the following letter will be used as the keyboard 'shortcut letter' for accessing the menu with the Alt-<letter> combination.

sendAnyway.description: Used on a warning dialog to make it clear that it might be risky to send the message.

youMarkedAsVerified.message: 您已将与$name$的安全码标记为已验证。
youMarkedAsVerified.description: Shown in the conversation history when the user marks a contact as verified.

connecting.description: Displayed when the desktop client is currently connecting to the server.

deleteAllDataBody.message: You are about to delete all of this application's saved account information, including all contacts and all messages. You can always link with your mobile device again, but that will not restore deleted messages.
deleteAllDataBody.description: Text describing what exactly will happen if the user clicks the button to delete all data

sessionEnded.description: This is a past tense, informational message. In other words, your secure session has been reset.

timerOption_1_week_abbreviated.description: Very short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation header

timerOption_5_seconds.description: Label for a selectable option in the message expiration timer menu

youMarkedAsNotVerifiedOtherDevice.message: 您标记了您与$name$的从其他设备连接的安全码为未确认状态。
youMarkedAsNotVerifiedOtherDevice.description: Shown in the conversation history when we discover that the user marked a contact as not verified on another device.

goToSupportPage.description: Item under the Help menu, takes you to the support page

finishLinkingPhone.description: The text on the button to finish the linking process, after choosing the device name

multipleJoinedTheGroup.description: Shown in the conversation history when more than one person joins the group

loading.description: Message shown on the loading screen before we've loaded any messages

newMessages.description: Displayed in notifications for multiple messages

theirIdentityUnknown.message: 您还未与该联系人有任何通讯，您的安全代码将会在您对其发送第一条消息后显示。

voiceMessage.description: Name for a voice message attachment

importCompleteStartButton.message: 开始使用 Signal 桌面版
importCompleteStartButton.description: Button shown at end of successful import process, nothing left but a restart

keychanged.message: 您与$name$的安全码已经改变。点击展示

updatedTheGroup.description: Shown in the conversation history when someone updates the group

identityKeyErrorOnSend.message: 您与$name$的安全码已改变。这表示可能有人试图偷听您的对话，也可能只是$name$重新安装了 Signal。您可能要重新验证与联系人的安全码。
identityKeyErrorOnSend.description: Shown when user clicks on a failed recipient in the message detail view after an identity key change

clearDataExplanation.message: This will clear all data in the application, removing all messages and saved account information.
clearDataExplanation.description: Text describing what the clear data button will do.

to.description: Label for the receiver of a message

timerOption_1_hour_abbreviated.description: Very short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation header

optimizingApplication.description: Message shown on the loading screen while we are doing application optimizations

mainMenuFile.description: The label that is used for the File menu in the program main menu. The '&' indicates that the following letter will be used as the keyboard 'shortcut letter' for accessing the menu with the Alt-<letter> combination.

clearDataHeader.description: Header in the settings dialog for the section dealing with data deletion

timerOption_10_seconds_abbreviated.description: Very short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation header

linkNewDevice.description: The menu option shown in Signal iOS to add a new linked device

nameAndMessage.description: Label for setting notifications to display name and message text

menuSetupAsStandalone.description: Only available on development modes, menu option to open up the standalone device setup sequence

failedToSend.message: 无法发送给某些收件人，请检查您的网络连接。

identityChanged.message: 您的此联系人的安全代码已更改。这可能意味着有人试图拦截你的通信，或者这个联系人重新安装了Signal。您可能想验证以下新安全代码。

changedSinceVerifiedMultiple.message: 自上次验证以来，您与多为群组成员的安全码已发生改变。这可能表示有人试图偷听您的对话，或者只是联系人他们重新安装了 Signal。
changedSinceVerifiedMultiple.description: Shown on confirmation dialog when user attempts to send a message

loadDataHeader.description: Header shown on the first screen in the data import process

submitDebugLog.description: Menu item and header text for debug log modal (sentence case)

startConversation.description: Label underneath number a user enters that is not an existing contact

titleIsNow.description: Shown in the conversation history when someone changes the title of the group

changedRightAfterVerify.message: 您想验证的安全码已改变。请检查您与$name$的新安全码。切记，验证码改变意味着可能有人试图截取您的通讯，也可能只是$name$重新安装了 Signal。
changedRightAfterVerify.description: Shown on the safety number screen when the user has selected to verify/unverify a contact's safety number, and we immediately discover a safety number change

timerSetTo.description: Displayed in the conversation list when the timer is updated.

timerOption_30_seconds_abbreviated.description: Very short format indicating current timer setting in the conversation header

audio.description: Shown in a quotation of a message containing an audio attachment if no text was originally provided with that attachment

youMarkedAsVerifiedOtherDevice.message: 您已在另一个设备将与$name$的安全码标记为已验证。
youMarkedAsVerifiedOtherDevice.description: Shown in the conversation history when we discover that the user marked a contact as verified on another device.

hide.description: Command in the tray icon menu, to hide the window
